short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable flexible access to web resources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The main feature of this add-on is to use WebRequest API of Chrome extension to redirect web requests to Youtube.com pages/resource files to go through webcitizens.org to allow those requests to be fulfilled successfully. This add-on is used by users who want to visit Youtube.com but are not able to do so because of network restrictions. This add-on works like a special-purpose web proxy that allows the users to visit Youtube.com.
